title: Next Level Chef
overview: Next Level Chef is set in an iconic and trailblazing TV studio like no other, with three unique kitchen spaces set across three storeys and almost 50ft high.Each floor will test the contestants' culinary creativity, agility, flare, and expertise, as they vie to progress to the Next Level. From the top-level state of the art kitchen utopia to the gloomy basement level â€˜scraps only' surroundings, Next Level Chef will task its chefs to prove they can thrive in any environment.
